title: Start Right, Stay Connected Couple Workshop - March 5, 2016
desc: Engaged?... Newly married?... Thinking of going in that direction? ? ?Start Right, Stay Connected? ? ? is a one-day program designed to provide couples with the knowledge and tools to navigate the challenges of marriage.? In a fun and dynamic setting, you will learn to more effectively communicate with your partner, deepen your connection and create a shared vision for your relationship.
